name: VitySmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, turn on Living fan”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
After you have linked your VITY account with this Skill, you can use your voice to issue commands:

Switch
· Alexa, turn on the Bedroom light
· Alexa, dim the Living Room lights to 25%
· Alexa, set the hallway lights to blue

Sockets
· Alexa, turn on the Bedroom fan
· Alexa, turn off the Living Room Lamp

Air-conditioner
· Alexa, set Kitchen temperature to 72 degrees
· Alexa, decrease the Bedroom temperature
· Alexa, what is my thermostat set to?

Sensor
· Alexa, is the front door open?
· Alexa, did I open the back door?
· Alexa, has someone left the kitchen cabinet open?

To get started, after linking to your VITY account select "Enable" and then select "Discover" to search for suitable devices.
